text: The Ivy Creek Greenway is a multi-use trail under construction in the cities of Buford, Georgia and Suwanee, Georgia, in the United States. In 2014, a 1.5-mile section of the trail was added and includes two boardwalks, an overlook and a 270-foot cable bridge spanning Ivy Creek. On February 27, 2018, the greenway was designated as one of the signature trails of Gwinnett County. ==See also== *Cycling infrastructure *10-Minute Walk *Smart growth *Walkability ==References== ==External links== *Ivy Creek Greenway Category:Bike paths in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Buford, Georgia Category:Suwanee, Georgia Category:Transportation in Gwinnett County, Georgia Category:Tourist attractions in Gwinnett County, Georgia
title: Ivy Creek Greenway
